lead_paragraph: Crowds seek the little piggy buns along with the classics at this perpetually packed restaurant in Manhattan’s Chinatown.

headline.print_headline: An Eye on the Dim-Sum Prize
headline.main: At Joy Luck Palace, Dim Sum Amid the Chaos
